Class FileUtils

java.lang.Object
dev.bjdelacruz.commons.utils.FileUtils
public final class FileUtils extends Object
Utility class that contains methods for reading from and writing to a file. Contains a main method that tests the readFile methods and displays the results in a JFrame.

  • Method Details

    • writeToFile

      public static void writeToFile(List<String> lines, File file) throws IOException
      Writes the given list of strings (lines) to the given file.
      Parameters:
      lines - The lines to write to the file.
      file - The file to write to.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there are problems writing to the file.

    • loadProperties

      public static void loadProperties(Properties properties, File propertiesFile) throws IOException
      Loads all the properties (key-value pairs) from a file.
      Parameters:
      properties - The Properties object into which to put the properties.
      propertiesFile - The properties file from which the properties are loaded.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the properties could not be loaded from the file.

    • saveProperty

      public static void saveProperty(String key, String value, File propertiesFile) throws IOException
      Saves the given property (key-value pair) to the given properties file.
      Parameters:
      key - The key.
      value - The value.
      propertiesFile - The properties file to which the property is saved.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the property could not be saved to the given file.

    • getProperty

      public static Optional<String> getProperty(String key, File propertiesFile)
      Gets the value for the given key from the given properties file. Returns null if the key is not found in the file or the file does not exist.
      Parameters:
      key - The key whose value is to be retrieved.
      propertiesFile - The properties file from which to get the value for the given key.
      Returns:
      The value for the given key, or null if the key is not found in the file or the file does not exist.

    • getIntProperty

      public static int getIntProperty(String key, File propertiesFile)
      Gets the int value for the given key from the given properties file. Returns 0 if the key is not found in the file, the file does not exist, or the value is not an int.
      Parameters:
      key - The key whose value is to be retrieved.
      propertiesFile - The properties file from which to get the value for the given key.
      Returns:
      The value for the given key, or 0 if the key is not found in the file, the file does not exist, or the value is not an int.

    • getBooleanProperty

      public static boolean getBooleanProperty(String key, File propertiesFile)
      Gets the boolean value for the given key from the given properties file. Returns false if the key is not found in the file, the file does not exist, or the value is not a boolean.
      Parameters:
      key - The key whose value is to be retrieved.
      propertiesFile - The properties file from which to get the value for the given key.
      Returns:
      The value for the given key, or false if the key is not found in the file, the file does not exist, or the value is not a boolean.

    • configureLogger

      public static void configureLogger(Logger logger, int logSize, int logRotationCount, String filename)
      Sets the logger to write to the given file.
      Parameters:
      logger - The logger.
      logSize - The size of the log file.
      logRotationCount - The number of log files to use.
      filename - The name of the file to which to write logging information.
